"Hom nsuasua me: "Afei miyi hom ayɛw dɛ hom kaa me adze nyina mu
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": na hom da ho dze atsetsesɛm no mu
"#1 Kor 4.16; Fil 3.17": dɛ mbrɛ medze hyɛɛ hom nsa no ara."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Na mepɛ dɛ hom hu dɛ ɔbarimba biara ne tsir nye Kraest
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": na ɔbaa ne tsir nye ɔbarimba
"#1 Kor 4.16; Fil 3.17": na Kraest ne tsir nye Nyankopɔn."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Ɔbarimba biara a ɔrosɔr
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": anaa ɔrehyɛ nkɔm
"#1 Kor 4.16; Fil 3.17": na ɔakata ne tsir no

"Hom nsuasua me: "Na ɔbaa biara a ɔrosɔr
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": anaa ɔrehyɛ nkɔm
"#1 Kor 4.16; Fil 3.17": na ɔannkata ne tsir no
column6: na ɔtse dɛ nyia ɔapra ne tsir no ara."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Na sɛ ɔannkata ne tsir a
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": ma ɔmpra ne tsir so; na sɛ ɔyɛ enyito ma ɔbaa dɛ oyi anaa ɔpra ne tsir a
"#1 Kor 4.16; Fil 3.17": ɔnodze ma ɔnkata ne tsir."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Na ɔbarimba dze
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": ɔnnsɛ dɛ ɔkata ne tsir
"#1 Kor 4.16; Fil 3.17": osiandɛ ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn no honyi nye n’enyimnyam
column5: na ɔbaa dze ɔyɛ ɔbarimba n’enyimnyam."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Na nnyɛ ɔbarimba na ofi ɔbaa mu
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": na mbom ɔbaa na ofi ɔbarimba mu;"

"Hom nsuasua me: "eso nnyɛ ɔbaa ntsi na wɔbɔɔ ɔbarimba
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": na mbom ɔbarimba ntsi na wɔbɔɔ ɔbaa."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Iyi ntsi na ɔsɛ dɛ ɔbaa nya dza ɔkyerɛ tumdzi wɔ ne tsir do
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": wɔ abɔfo no ntsi."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Naaso Ewuradze mu dze
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": ɔbarimba nnkwetsir ɔbaa
"#1 Kor 4.16; Fil 3.17": na ɔbaa so nnkwetsir ɔbarimba:"

"Hom nsuasua me: "na dɛ mbrɛ ɔbaa fi ɔbarimba mu no
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": mbrɛ ɔbarimba so nam ɔbaa do ba nye no; na adze nyina fi Nyankopɔn mu."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Homankasa mbu hom mu atsɛn; ana oye dɛ ɔbaa dze tsir a ɔannkata do yɛ asɔr ma Nyankopɔn?"
"Ana ɔbrasu ara mpo nnkyerɛkyerɛ hom dɛ sɛ ɔbarimba sie tsir kusuww a
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": ɔyɛ enyimguase ma no a?"

"Hom nsuasua me: "Na sɛ ɔbaa dze osie tsir kusuww a
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": ɔyɛ enyimnyam ma no
"#1 Kor 4.16; Fil 3.17": osiandɛ wɔdze ne tsinhwi maa no dɛ akatado."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Na sɛ obi pɛ dɛ odzi ntokwano a
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": hɛn dze
"#1 Kor 4.16; Fil 3.17": yɛnnyɛ dɛm adze no
column5: na Nyankopɔn asɔrasɔr so nnyɛ dɛm."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Na dza medze rehyɛ hom yi
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": mirinnyi hom ayɛw
"#1 Kor 4.16; Fil 3.17": osiandɛ hom nnhyia mu wɔ papa ntsi

"Hom nsuasua me: "Dza odzi kan nye dɛ metse dɛ sɛ hom hyia mu wɔ asɔr mu a
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": mpaapaamu wɔ hom mu; na megye no mu bi midzi."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Oye dɛ fɛkuwbɔ horow ba hom mu
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": ama hɔn a wɔgye hɔn to mu no aada edzi wɔ hom mu."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Na sɛ hom behyia fakor a
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": nnyɛ Ewuradze edzidzi na hom dzi no:"

"Hom nsuasua me: "na hom ridzidzi a
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": ɔbaako dzi kan dzi nankasa n’edziban
"#1 Kor 4.16; Fil 3.17": na obi ɔkɔm dze no

"Hom nsuasua me: "Ebɛnadze ntsi a? Ana hom nnyi efi a hom dzidzi mu? Anaa nnyɛ Nyankopɔn asɔr na hom bu no enyimtsia
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": na hom hyɛ hɔn a wonnyi bi enyito? Mense hom dɛn? Minyi hom ayɛw wɔ yi mu anaa? Mirinnyi hom ayɛw."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Na emi dze
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": minyaa Ewuradze nsamu dza medze memaa hom no dɛ: Ewuradze Jesus anadwe no a woyii no mae no
"#1 Kor 4.16; Fil 3.17": ɔfaa paanoo;"

"Hom nsuasua me: "na ɔdaa ase no
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": obubui
"#1 Kor 4.16; Fil 3.17": na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Me nyimpadua a wɔdze ama hom nye yi: hom nyɛ iyi mfa nyɛ me nkaa."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Dɛmara so na edzidzi ekyir no ɔfaa kɔɔpow no see dɛ
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": Kɔɔpow yi nye ahyɛmu fofor no wɔ mo bɔgyaa mu: hom nyɛ iyi mber biara a hom bɔnom no mfa nyɛ me nkaa."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Na mber biara a hom dzi paanoo yi
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": na hom nom kɔɔpow yi
"#1 Kor 4.16; Fil 3.17": hom bɔ Ewuradze wu no ho dawur dze kesi dɛ ɔbɛba."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Dɛm ntsi obiara a obedzi paanoo yi
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": anaa ɔbɔnom Ewuradze kɔɔpow yi dɛ mbrɛ ɔnnsɛ no
"#1 Kor 4.16; Fil 3.17": obedzi Ewuradze nyimpadua nye no bɔgyaa ho fɔ."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Na ma nyimpa nsɔ noho nhwɛ
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": na ondua dɛm ndzi paanoo no bi
"#1 Kor 4.16; Fil 3.17": na ɔnnom kɔɔpow no bi."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Na nyia odzi na ɔnom no
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": odzi na ɔnom dze atsɛmbu ba nankasa noho do
"#1 Kor 4.16; Fil 3.17": osiandɛ oemmbu Ewuradze nyimpadua bi yie."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Iyi ntsi na hom mu pii ayɛ mberɛw na wɔyaryar
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": na piinara so adeda ."
"#1 Kor 4.16; Fil 3.17": "#11.30 ADEDA: Iyi ase kyerɛ dɛ: Ewuwu."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Na sɛ yeebu hɛnankasa hɛnho yie a
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": nkyɛ wommbuu hɛn atsɛn."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Na sɛ wobu hɛn atsɛn a
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": Ewuradze tsea hɛn amma woeemmbu yɛnye wiadze fɔ."

"Hom nsuasua me: "Dɛm ntsi
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": mo nuanom
"#1 Kor 4.16; Fil 3.17": sɛ hom behyia mu ribedzidzi a

"Hom nsuasua me: "Na sɛ ɔkɔm dze bi a
dɛ mbrɛ mo so musuasua Kraest no.": wɔmma ondzidzi fie
"#1 Kor 4.16; Fil 3.17": mma hom eemmbehyia mu emmbenya atsɛmbu. Na nkaa no dze
